name: Cymbalism
summary: Cymbalism was a Flash, Shockwave and Java-based mixer game from Phase 1 that was available on the Korean Double CD of Gorillaz and on the Recording Studio of the Kong Studios website from 2001 to 2003. The game consisted of mixing tools to the Gorillaz song "19-2000" with multiple stems for the track. Also on the website were stems and samples available on other rooms for other songs as well, such as samples and sound files for "Tomorrow Comes Today", "Hip Albatross" and many others, and multitrack stems for two demo songs: "Hand Clapper" and "Gor Beaten", the second one being not fully released to this day.
